headline: UBS Lifts Broadcom (AVGO) PT to $472, Keeps Buy Rating on Profitable Tech Stock
summary: Broadcom Inc. (NASDAQ:AVGO) is one of the most profitable tech stocks to buy. On December 1, UBS raised the firm’s price target on Broadcom to $472 from $415, while keeping a Buy rating on the shares. On the same day, Bank of America analyst Vivek Arya raised the firm’s price target on Broadcom to $460 […]

headline: Fed Rate Decision, Broadcom and Costco Earnings: What to Watch This Week
summary: The Federal Reserve will hold its last rate-setting meeting of 2025 this week. A few notable earnings are also due, including Broadcom, Oracle and Adobe, plus retailer Costco. Here's what to expect: Today   Earnings: Toll Brothers   Tomorrow  Earnings: AutoZone, Campbell’s, GameStop   Economic data: October job openings and labor turnover survey (JOLTS).

Here's what to expect: Today   Earnings: Toll Brothers   Tomorrow  Earnings: AutoZone, Campbell’s, GameStop   Economic data: October job openings and labor turnover survey (JOLTS).

headline: Marvell stock falls on Microsoft-Broadcom talks and Amazon design loss fears
summary: Investing.com -- Marvell Technology (NASDAQ:MRVL) stock fell 6% Monday following reports that Microsoft is in discussions with Broadcom about custom chip designs and a Benchmark analyst downgrade over concerns about losing Amazon’s business.

headline: Oracle, Broadcom earnings on tap: What investors are watching
summary: Oracle (ORCL) is set to report second quarter results on Wednesday, while Broadcom (AVGO) is reporting fourth quarter results on Thursday. Yahoo Finance Markets and Data Editor Jared Blikre joins Morning Brief host Julie Hyman to go over the company stock action and explain what investors will be looking for from the upcoming earnings reports. To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Morning Brief.

To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Morning Brief.
